title: Problem with buying new champion
body:
Well,I buy Thresh for 6300 BE,and i dont like him and i refund.They back me all 6300 BE,then i buy Akali for 3150, but she isn't in my collection and i cant play with her,and 3150 BE  was taken from my balance.
How resolve this?

replies.body: I bought Kayn 2 times lost 12600 BE and no Kayn. Hope they will help with the problem

Kayn was successfully added to your account, but I'm really not sure why the store allowed you to buy him again =\ . No worries, I've made sure Kayn is unlocked for you and returned the double charged BE

It looks like the EUNE store was having some issues with delivering purchased champions earlier today. I did check again on my end, and your account does have Akali sitting in your collection now. If you don't see her, try refreshing your client and picking her in a custom game. If that still doesn't work, shoot a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) our way!

Same issue :x i bought Vayne - didn't get her but when i bought Ryze i got him...I wasted my refund to check this out and it's not working for my Vayne -.- Repair it asap...2nd thing is that i don't have any blue essence orb quests -.-
I have it too :C i bought zed and i dont have him feel you brothers...
I have same problem bought renekton for 4800 blue essence and didnt get him
Well, I have the same problem bought Akali for 3150 blue essence it took my essence but I don't have Akali :(
